post.body: Up Jumped the Devil?
It's a good bet! lol I switched to Cold Case on CBS. I can only take so much champagne bubble music.
I have a sudden craving for chocolate cake.
I just ate a handful of salted cocktail nuts for dinner. Exciting, no?
This movie always makes me crave nachos. lol
Now I'm watching Napoleon Dynamite. I lead such an exciting life...
"Schadenfreude:" Even the word is kind of funny.
Why am I so antsy today?
The blonde chick from Cold Case is as annoying as hell.
OK I can't stand it any more. I'm going to watch the news.
I had a dream that someone who is currently not talking to me called me up to make amends. It made me sad when I woke up. Just a dream. :-(
Christ, I need a life... :p
The Lawrence Welk show gives me flashbacks to watching it with my Norwegian neighbor lady. She'd make us tea and cookies.
Yes. I am watching Lawrence Welk. I am old. But I love a good accordion. You betcha. They're doing Pennsylvania Polka. How can you resist?
What to eat for supper? Hmm.
$50,000 worth of Meiji insects. Damn. She must be happy.
How sad that the crap from our childhood won't be worth much on Antiques Roadshow in the year 2100. We're a disposable society. :(
If Antiques Roadshow ever hits Syracuse I am totally going with this Russian icon thingy I was given as a gift when I was in the USSR

Oooo a bronze kitty statue. Nice.
I love Antiques Roadshow.
Duck decoys worth $20,000? Are you serious? My car isn't worth that much.
